item.title: Cloning an SSD Replacement
item.description: Never Enough Storage If you read my previous blog post “How to replace the SSD in an HP Envy X360 laptop” then this section title should look familiar. In case you didn’t read that previous post, I upgraded my 500 GB SSD to a 1 TB SSD. This process will describe how I cloned the existing SSD and the problems I encountered (along with solutions). Please note that this is not a tutorial about using a specific tool for cloning.
